job.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
job.description: stronguAbout Walrusaibrbrustrongwalrusai is a new approach to testing and ensuring confidence in complex web applications Through a combination of human intelligence and computer execution we offer quick and reliable monitoring and testing from simple plainEnglish instructions Our goal is to eliminate time wasted on writing and maintaining tests across the entire stack allowing engineers instead to focus on building productsbrbrWe are backed by great investors and are making our first hire This is a great opportunity to shape a company in a massive market from the ground up There are 3 of us and we are based in San Francisco This position is also remotefriendlybrbrstronguAs Our First Hire You WillbrustrongulliWork closely with the rest of the team engineering product design to define and implement new features from start to finish with clean and welltested code devops server clientliliBuild maintain and continuously improve our internal automation tooling to ensure quick and reliable test results for our clientsliliBuild and maintain infrastructure and monitoring such that our clients are consistently having the best possible experiencebrliulstronguOur ValuesbrbrustrongListen FirstbrbrWe believe in empowering and delighting our customers The biggest part of that is listening to them when theyre happy and when theyre frustrated Before making any hard decision listen to different points of view collect as much insight as possible and move forward with conviction Dont bring the ego in the buildingbrbrAlways learnbrbrFailure is embraced as long as you learn something from itbrbrWe believe in curiosity and firstprinciples reasoning All ideas are welcome and debate is embraced We aim for clarity of thought and collecting diverse points of view from our team and our customersbrbrKeep it simplebrbrStock is the backbone of good cooking just roast some bones roast some vegetables put them in a big pot with water and reduce and reduce and reduce  Anthony BourdainbrbrWhether cooking writing a book or managing your workload boiling ideas down to their essence and bringing elegant simplicity to complex systems are the backbones of operational excellencebrbrstronguEngineering Qualificationsbrustrongulli2 years of engineering experience in a consumer or enterprise software companyliliProficient in frontend technologies being familiar with the DOM and how to interact with itliliCapable of diving into backend code to write new features from top to bottomliliBS in computer science or related field or relevant work experiencebrliulstronguBonusesbrustrongulliBrowser automation experience Puppeteer Selenium CypressliliExperience with ReactJSbrliulstronguPersonal QualitiesbrustrongulliYou understand and care deeply about the ramifications of the code you write on the customer and on the business liliYou think from firstprinciplesliliYou are comfortable with the ambiguity and pace of iteration of an earlystage startup liliYou are resourceful and will do whatever to deliver delightful customer experiencesliliYou have strong opinions but are open to changing your mindliliYou believe that a steeper slope makes up for a lot of yinterceptbrliulThe salary range for this position is 120000  180000brbr
